name: Claw Master 9000
description:
Claw Master 9000 is a classic arcade minigame where your goal is to fish out the most interesting toys the machine has to offer.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

SPACE to drop the claw

Background music: Lobby Time by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3986-lobby-time

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Sound effects from freesound.org

Additional sound effects by Salli Pöyry

Game and graphics (c) Milla Pöyry 2021

Made in Game Development Essentials course in Turku AMK
